name: Ancient power Released
text: Your Opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to this cards activation. You can only activate this card if you have a "Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon" on your Field as well as 1 "Ancient Dark Magician" and 1 "Ancient Red_Eyes B. Dragon" on your field or in your hand and the field spell "Temple of the Ancients" is on the field, send all 3 to your grave yard and if you do Special Summon 1 "Ancient Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon" from your extra deck or graveyard (this is treated as a fusion summon), and if you do you can only summon Omni Monsters the rest of the turn.
